properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:20AM CST until January 11 at 12:56PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Oklahoma...

Illinois River near Watts affecting Adair and Delaware Counties.

Illinois River at Chewey affecting Adair...Cherokee and Delaware
Counties.

Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County.

Flint Creek near Kansas affecting Cherokee and Delaware Counties.

Baron Fork River at Eldon affecting Cherokee County.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Flint Creek near Kansas.
* from late tonight to Saturday afternoon, or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  1:30 AM Friday, the stage was  6.49 feet.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The Flint Creek near Kansas is expected to rise above
flood stage early Saturday morning and continue to rise to near
11.3 feet by Saturday morning. The river is expected to fall below
flood stage Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 11.0 feet, minor flooding occurs from Fidlers Bend to
Chewey Bridge. Permanent campgrounds and farmlands are affected.
Turbulence makes the river unsafe for floating.
